name: Barry's Night Shift
description:
Welcome to the night shift.

Barry (designation B4-RY) is a medium end security drone tasked with patrolling the entire facility each night for intruders.

However, tonight is going to be a rough shift. A virus was uploaded to the facilities systems, infecting all robots currently connected to their charge stations. 

Unfortunately the only one who wasn't connected was Barry, now he has to make his way along the security route while trying to stay alive and reach the admin room to stop the virus, save his friends, and save the human workers from a deadly day shift.
